DOC.brief_summary: In order determine whether L4 L5 primary dorsal rami S1-3 lateral branch radiofrequency denervation effective sacroiliac ( SI ) joint pain , conduct randomize , control study .
DOC.brief_title: A Placebo-Controlled Study Assessing Lateral Branch Radiofrequency Denervation Sacroiliac ( SI ) Joint Pain
DOC.detailed_description: 30 subject SI joint pain confirm SI joint injection randomize receive either L4 L5 primary dorsal rami S1-3 lateral branch radiofrequency denervation sham denervation . To facilitate patient blinding , group 1 ml lidocaine inject true ( sham ) denervation patient feel heat . The stimulation group blind assessed procedure . Follow-up visit 1,3 6-months postprocedure .
DOC.criteria: Sacroiliac joint pain Age > 18 No focal neurological sign symptom , coagulopathy , unstable medical psychiatric condition
